Title: Ukraine to lose $1 billion due to Russian restrictions
Content: Ukraine will lose at least $1 billion this year due to trade and transit restrictions imposed by Russia.Russia’s transit ban will directly reduce Ukraine’s export volume to Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan,
Author: IANS
Description: Ukraine will lose at least $1 billion this year due to trade and transit restrictions imposed by Russia.Russia’s transit ban will directly reduce Ukraine’s export volume to Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan,
